properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 10:52PM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North
Carolina...

Neuse River Near Clayton affecting Johnston County
Neuse River At Smithfield affecting Johnston County
Neuse River Near Goldsboro affecting Wayne County

The Flood Warning continues for the Neuse River Near Goldsboro.
* from Saturday afternoon until further notice, or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 10:15 PM Friday the stage was 15.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* The river will rise above flood stage by tomorrow early afternoon
and continue to rise to near 22.0 feet by Wednesday early afternoon.
* At 22.0 feet, Flooding begins on Seymour Johnson Air Force Base.
* At 21.0 feet, Riverview Trailer Park homes and Stevens Mill
Road begin to flood.
* At 20.0 feet, Arrington Bridge Road and access roads around
Seymour Johnson Air Force Base flood.
* At 19.5 feet, Ferry Bridge Road begins to flood.
* At 18.0 feet, Minor flood stage. Water overflows the banks
at the SR1915 bridge and upstream of the US117 bridge.
properties.instruction:
Safety message. If you encounter deep water while driving, do not
attempt to drive through. Turn around, dont drown.
